head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Shirley: Boy Drowns In Pool

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Shirley: Boy Drowns In Pool

block.p: A Long Island toddler drowned in a neighbor's pool yesterday after wandering away from home, the Suffolk County police said. The boy, Anthony Muniz, 3, was reported missing by his mother, Denise Morrisette of Auborn Avenue, shortly after 9 a.m., the police said. After searching the neighborhood and knocking on doors, neighbors and Ms. Morrisette found the boy in a neighbor's pool. The police said the in-ground pool had been properly fenced.
